verses.roman:
āge nṛtya kare gaura lañā bhakta-gaṇa
ratha rākhi' jagannātha karena daraśana

synonyms: āge-in front; nṛtya kare-dances; gaura-Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; lañā-accompanied by; bhakta-gaṇa-the devotees; ratha rākhi'-after stopping the car; jagannātha-Lord Jagannātha; karena daraśana-sees.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and His devotees were dancing in front of the car, and, having stopped the car, Lord Jagannātha watched the dancing.
